definition[0]: to use all or most of your time, effort etc in order to do something or help someone
example[0]: He devoted his energies to writing films.
note[0]: devote your time/energy/attention etc to something
example[1]: She devoted herself full-time to her business.
explanation[0]: In everyday English, people usually say put time/energy etc into something rather than devote time/energy etc to something:
example[2]: He put a lot of time into the project.
definition[1]: to use a particular area, period of time, or amount of space for a specific purpose
example[3]: The meeting will be devoted to health and safety issues.
